name: PhiHenna Eyebrow Threading Thread 300m
short_description: Phi thread is the safest and most precise method of hair removal and brow shaping , especially for the delicate areas surrounding the eye.
long_description: Phi Thread allows you to have highest possible control over each and every hair that needs to be removed. 100% natural technique of brow sculpting with a soft and light pressure and touch, without artificial waxes, chemicals, or invasive pressure included, which makes it the best choice, especially before brow tinting.
